0P0000ISNV.L.long_name: LF Bentley Sterling Income Fund Income
0P0000ISNV.L.summary: The aim of the Sub-fund is to provide a higher income return than short-term cash deposits from a low risk diversified portfolio of corporate bonds, government securities, non-equity based collective investment schemes, cash and money market instruments. All direct holdings will be sterling denominated and any collective investment scheme will hold sterling assets or have an active policy of hedging the currency exposure of non-sterling denominated assets.
